title: "Ukrainian Education: The State of Reform" - HE Dr Serhiy Kvit, Minister of Education and Science of Ukraine
desc: Dr Serhiy Kvit was appointed Minister of Education and Science in 2014. Prior to his appointment, he was Dean of the Department of Social Sciences and Social Technologies at the National University of ?Kyiv-Mohyla Academy? (2002-2007), and was later elected its President? (2007-2014).??  Serhiy Kvit graduated from the Department of Journalism, Kyiv National Taras Shevchenko University and was Director of the School of Journalism at ?Kyiv-Mohyla Academy? from 2001 to 2007.?  His areas of interest are philosophy, hermeneutics, mass communication, and university management.
